issue.title: New component DASHBOARD
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

This component will add advanced dashboard in EasySDI.

_Further description needed..._

**Fixed versions :** 4.0.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

the new component was committed in RC 6 of easysdi V4 and contain 1 dashboard "diffusion" which contains the main indicators of the diffusion done through the portal (via extraction and download) :


- general overview
- analytics for given period of time with more detailed indicators (top extraction, top users, top download, ...)

See attached file to have a general idea.

**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

Remaining task : documention to write in the easysdi wiki for dashboard installation and general parameters (birt report engine mainly)

**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Thanks to ASIT-VD for this great new feature!
I propose to close such ticket as this feature is now available in easySDI V4.
If you want to keep trace of DASHBOARD documentation, don't hesitate to create a new ticket about such task.

Thanks again,
